name: Pawdventure
description:
In Pawdventure you must guide your dog through the neighborhood, but you'll find a path full of obstacles that won't make it easy. Living in community has these things, so you must arm yourself with patience to help your furry friend discover the world that he'll begin to explore with you.

.. CREDITS ..

Game idea  & design by VevianArt (Ana V. Villegas) and Acorma92 (Aida Cortés)

Programming by Mrjdiez (Julián Diez) 

2D art and UI design by VevianArt (Ana V. Villegas)

SFXs & music arrangements by Acorma92 (Aida Cortés)

Music by Jonny Boyle, All Good Folks, Zoo, Mood Maze (Uppbeat.io)

SFX by Epidemic Sound.com
